page.title: 17 A MODERN MOTEL
page.content: The Post House Hotel is situated near Junction 7 of the M6. It is a large hotel with 204 bedrooms and the busiest time of their year is early July. The hotel has an average staff of 80 people. A single room costs Â£35.50 for bed and breakfast for one night. This is roughly the same as an old age pensioner is paid for a week! Most people only stay one night and continue their journey on the motorway the following morning. Facilities include a swimming pool, a barbecue, two bars and attractive landscaped gardens. The bars are open until 10.30 p.m. and the restaurants are popular with local residents. The most frequently ordered dish is steak. Staff wear a special uniform. They say that although most visitors are English, quite a few come from abroad.
